description:
The Ultimate Strobe Light is a simple yet fun and effective app that turns your device into a flashing beamer! With many custom speeds and styles, The Ultimate Strobe Light is literally THE ULTIMATE STROBE LIGHT! Works great at parties, raves, in the dark, stranded on an island, trapped in a well, bored to death, and even more! And best of all, it works as a Strobe Light and basic Flashlight!

-3 speeds of the old fashioned black and white strobe light
-3 speeds of a rainbow strobe!
-An S.O.S. light!
-An Illusion for tripping out your friends!
-Abstract for random fun!
-A flashlight for any dark setting!

**WARNING** -Before using this app, please make sure that you are not sensitive to flashing lights. Do not use this application if you, or others around you, have photosensitive epilepsy. For more information on photosensitive epilepsy, go to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Photosensitive_epilepsy
